name: wine tasting party kit
description: The perfect gift for an oenophile or excuse to hold your own collaborative wine tasting party, this kit* contains coordinated components in a palatte of peacock blue and gold. We've partnered up with blackbird letterpress to print a few handmade paper keepsakes in the set, so you can host this party again and again until you run out of wines! Host nor guests need be wine experts, nor will they (likely) leave so - the intention is for everyone to enjoy a light-hearted evening, learning more about the broad categories of wine in order to discover what they like. Now participants will know what to ask for when visiting their favorite shop or restaurant sommelier! as seen at our launch party with recipes Wine Tasting Kit Contents (for a party of 6 individuals or 6 pairs) : 1 letterpress aroma wheel 6 letterpress coasters 6 letterpress wine tags 6 postcard invitations 6 tasting notes 6 pencils Instructions & advice to conduct the wine tasting + recommendations for food pairings cheers! * wholesale, bulk and custom orders available - email for quote

name: vanilla extract kit
description: make your own vanilla extract with this all in one kit (homemade is way better tasting than most grocery store offerings) includes: • 8 oz frosted glass bottle with aluminum top • 2 Madagascar vanilla beans • instruction / how to sheet • recipe for an amazing vanilla cordial packaged in a muslin bag + kraft cylinder with recycled paper shreds ships in its own container, includes delivery confirmation under $20 gift idea hostess • baker • mom • holiday • self • d.i.y. home made hip™ by larks & japes

name: aquavit - make your own Scandinavian liquor
description: a taste of Scandinavia diy mockavit (mock akvavit) kit all the ingredients [sans the actual alcohol, sorry] to throw a skål! worthy party at home as seen at larks & japes aquavit & food pairing party included in kit: pint jar dry seeds and spices labels instruction sheet with serving suggestions

name: thank you note letterpress card set
description:
smitten for handwritten

Printed by blackbird letterpress in larks & japes red ink with handset type and debossed with  multiple radial patterns, these cards are made from 100% cotton and each measure 4.75"x3.5" folded.

Set of six cards come with soft pink, recycled envelopes in kraft paper box.

wedding • hostess • shower

name: make your own cocktail bitters kit
description: cocktail recipes and a party in a can. sorta. dry ingredients* & instructions packaged oh so eco-friendly together, along with coasters printed by blackbird letterpress. and yes, that is a spinner game, so when guests can't make up their mind which cocktail to try, have them give this gizmo a whirl. homemade bitters kit includes: 1 amber glass dropper 1 letterpress recipes coaster / spinner (printed by @blackbirdletter) 4 letterpress coasters (keep or give as party favors) dry ingredients, packaged in small airtight tin & envelopes instruction sheet with additional recipes 1 square of cheesecloth 1 small plastic funnel 1 dissolvable label kit arrives in kraft cylinder stuffed with recycled paper ships as its own container with delivery confirmation included cheers indeed! home made hip™ by larks & japes * alcohol not included

name: homemade citrus cocktail bitters kit
description: impress guests with your mixology magic dry ingredients* & instructions packaged oh so eco-friendly together, along with coasters printed by blackbird letterpress. and yes, that is a spinner game, so when guests can't make up their mind which cocktail to try, have them give this gizmo a whirl. homemade bitters kit includes: 1 amber glass dropper 1 letterpress recipes coaster / spinner (printed by @blackbirdletter) 4 letterpress coasters (keep or give as party favors) dry ingredients, packaged in small airtight tin & envelopes instruction sheet with additional recipes 1 square of cheesecloth 1 small plastic funnel 1 dissolvable label kit arrives in kraft cylinder stuffed with recycled paper ships as its own container with delivery confirmation included cheers indeed home made hip™ by larks & japes * alcohol not included

name: letter press cards - recipes
description:
blank recipe cards sweet enough to eat

Okay, they're not really edible, but the design is cute (without being cloying) and leaves plenty of space to save your special recipes. 

Set of 10 recipe cards, designed by larks & japes and printed by blackbirdletterpress.com on eco-friendly bamboo paper. 

Each card measures 4"x6" and the inks: light pink and red. 

Start your own recipe reliquary, present a set as a hostess gift (include a recipe from your own stash) or ask Mom to write down all the family favorites. It'll make her cry.

name: seed starting cup press
description:
say that three times fast!

Handturned paper pot making tool from wood craftsman, Andy Warden. Simply wrap a strip of newspaper two times around the base of the pin-shaped piece, tuck in the edges then twist into bottom cup. Like magic, you've got yourself a compostable little container to start some seeds or just admire on a sill.

Made from wood scraps, each one of a kind piece is approximately 7" tall and signed by Andy.

*instructions for use will be sent along with eco-cup press

name: pretty garden scissors
description:
small herbs and plants call for small shears

And we suppose small scissors call for fairly small hands. 4.25"x2.5" hand forged iron utility shears for flower cutting. 

Modeled after classic bonsai clippers, the shears are very strong despite their size.

Garden tools as decorative display - we like our products to pull double duty.

name: wasara eco friendly plates, cups & utensils - pretty paper table setting
description: beautiful green design - compostable place setting for 6 plates, cups & utensils :: unopened / new in packages weddings • rehearsal dinner • dinner party • eco ** please note, we have a variety of plate sizes, bowls, etc. not listed here if you should need bulk orders for events just email ** Let's just give a run down of how awesome these plates are, shall we? • genius design - an indention for your thumb to make carrying easier • cutlery with a thoughtful slot to attach - nibble while mingling! • lovely cream color, texture and elegant shape • completely biodegradable and compostable • single use - yes, we know they are pretty but at least that means no dishes to wash! • suitable for cold or hot foods, oil and water-resistant each set includes 6 plates Large: 9" diameter Medium: 6.5" diameter -- finally, beautiful, eco friendly paper place settings These gorgeous tumblers, sold in sets of 6, are made from sugar cane fiber, bamboo, and reed pulp. Fully compostable they are meant for single use, not to be washed. You can feel okay about throwing them away! Please keep in mind that as these are made from paper, they should not be used with liquids at or above boiling (212°F or 100°C). They will be hot to the touch when filled with hot liquids so please exercise caution. Japanese, sculptural eco-conscious design 4.0” x 3.2”, 10 oz. volume -- Bamboo utensils designed accompany the green tableware collection. Each utensil features a slot which securely attaches it to the edge of a plate or bowl. * not dishwasher safe - these products are meant to be single use only and are fully compostable Utensils, Pack of 18* 6.5” long *6 each Fork, Knife & Spoon elevating disposable tableware to a whole new level bulk quantities available, just shoot us an email. Mother Earth sends a high five. #wasara

name: handpicked color palettes
description: custom color combinations for your party, wedding, event or walls through our experience as an architect / interior decorator and designer, we have an eye for interesting and unexpected color schemes your purchase includes 3 different color palettes consisting of three colors each. we'll also send the coordinating pantone and RGB numbers so that you can match your selection to fabric, paint, paper, etc. in order to get started, please think about: 1. Do you have any specific colors, fabrics, dishes, etc. in mind that you’d like us to use to initiate the direction of the palette? Reference materials are appreciated. 2. What is the venue (if you have photos, great)? 3. Are there any colors we should stay away from? If you have a serious aversion to orange or some such, please let us know! we'll be in touch shortly to create your signature color scheme see some color inspiration examples on our site

name: food & film fest tickets
description: an evening of short films + clips related to food, entertaining & etiquette curated by larks & japes, hosted by Tom Schiller. weird • funny • obscure • instructional • questionable • strange loosely themed hors d'oeuvres provided by the cocktail party chef ticket price includes admission, 1 drink or beer, popcorn, screening & small bites December 5, 2013 7:30-9:30 pm videology corner of 308 Bedford Avenue & South 1st Street Williamsburg, Brooklyn
